name: PertussisTestsForBordetellaPertussisAntibodyExcludingPertussisToxinAntibody
title: Pertussis (Tests for Bordetella pertussis Antibody [Excluding Pertussis Toxin Antibody])
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bordetella pertussis antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Pertussis Ab),(Exclusion Criteria: Bordetella pertussis+Bordetella parapertussis filamentous hemagglutinin)
